about.profession: Systems Engineer and Web Developer (Full-Stack) with a preference for Frontend.
about.bio: As a Systems Engineer I'm deeply interested in web application development, especially visual design and interactivity (Frontend). I'm early in my professional journey and eager to learn, solve problems creatively and contribute to real products. My academic background gives me a solid foundation in technologies I'm ready to apply in real-world scenarios.

exeo.title: Software Engineer
points: As a Frontend Engineer I design and build web & mobile apps using React and React Native, focusing on high-impact user experiences.
I implement reusable, scalable component architectures and manage state efficiently with Redux and Context API for optimal performance.
I translate UI/UX designs into accessible, responsive, and visually consistent interfaces following best frontend practices.
I closely collaborate with backend teams integrating RESTful APIs (Spring Boot & Python) ensuring robust end-to-end functionality.
I actively contribute in agile ceremonies, code reviews and CI/CD workflows to continuously deliver quality value.

teacher.title: Computer Science Teacher
points: Designed and adapted CS lesson plans for five groups of 40 primary students, focusing on programming basics, digital literacy and computational thinking.
Created a practical, participative learning environment using tools like Office, G-Suite and visual programming (Pilas Bloques) for real-world problem solving.
Encouraged curiosity and critical thinking, building a solid foundation in both technical skills and ethical understanding of technology.
Continuously assessed student progress providing constructive, individualized feedback.

oil.name: Oilfield Equipment Control System
oil.description: Platform for monitoring, control and electronic logging of drilling, workover and pulling rigs; delivers robust real-time data in industrial energy environments. Responsible for UI development: reusable components, responsive dashboards, dynamic forms, and real-time visualization modules.

pregnancyApp.name: Pregnancy Tracking Mobile App
pregnancyApp.description: Mobile app for comprehensive pregnancy tracking: daily vital signs logging and real-time sharing with healthcare providers. Contributed to full UX/UI refactor and new features, re-implementing screens and flows for accessibility and cross-platform consistency (Android & iOS).
